website_summaries.verdict: Anyone who relies on Jackson Galaxy's cat expertise will also appreciate this quality digestive supplement that's made with cats' digestive needs in mind. Also helps curb or eliminate itchy, irritated skin that often accompanies allergies.
pros: Powdered formula that's easy to mix with food
Comes with a scoop for accurate measuring
Contains enzymes and 2 billion probiotic bacteria per scoop that work together to ease digestive issues as well as calm hot spots
cons: While many cats enjoy the flavor, not all do
Has been known to cause or increase diarrhea until cats adjust to it in their diets

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: It is only day 3. It's too soon to comment on its effectiveness. However, I will comment on the poor instructions. It says to use one scoop. How much is a scoop? Is there a scoop included, no. A scoop is a gram. Who uses grams in food measuring in the US?Don't we usually work with teaspoons and tablespoons? Secondly, it doesn't advise on how often you should give it to your cats. I feed my cats twice a day. Should I use it once a day? Or twice a day CORRECTION: there is a measuring scoop at the bottom of the powder. Dig deep.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty

customer_reviews.title: Jackson Galaxy Cat Probiotics
customer_reviews.text: Love the Cat Daddy and my Cat From Hell TV show, been watching since it came out. The scoop is buried in the jar with a stay fresh pouch, which I have never seen in a powder before? The scoop looks small but it is a 1/2 tsp. I checked because I put a scoop in my cats wet food and she got diarrhea, so I changed it and to a 1/8 tsp. But now she just smells the wet food and walks away and won't eat it. Wanted this to work but will be Returning
customer_reviews.author: Artist57

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates it. No matter how much I mixed it she wouldn't eat. Tried a few times but she would just sniff it and walk away (after of course giving me a weird look lol). Ate all her kibble instead which is rare for her since she prefers wet food. I know it was the product because I tested it by giving her the same food without it and she gobbled it up like she always does. Maybe others have had better luck but for me it was a waste of money....definitely NOT worth the price. Usually love Jackson galaxy products but this one sucks big time.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my cat's diarrhea in less than a week's time
customer_reviews.text: My cat has been suffering from irritable bowel syndrome for a while now and recently endured severe bouts of diarrhea. All the research I've read up on seems to point to cat probiotics. After trying a couple different brands, happy to report that this one is extremely efficient. I've been administering for 4 or 5 days now, with very clear improvement in my cat's digestive system. No discernible side effects of any kind either, which is a major plus in my book. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Sitruk

customer_reviews.title: Because i trust The Cat Daddy's name, i gave this a try. This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: My little furbaby has the wettest, foulest smelling bowl movements ever. She can quite literally clear a house. Phew!!! She only really eats wet foot, so we cut her daily intake of wet down so she'd eat more dry, and added this to her wet when its served, and in a few days we've smelled the difference. No more emergency poops in the toy bin cause she cant make it to the litter box, no more diahrrea, bit more solid now. She's more frisky, and the post poop victory laps are more victorious!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: It seems to have helped
customer_reviews.text: My boy vomits all the time. This seems to have helped. The three days I've given it to him have been vomit free :).
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Sloboda

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Diarrhea (10wk old kitten)
customer_reviews.text: One of my kittens adopted from the rescue had been having diarrhea for three days and the fecal tests from the vet all came out negative. We were feeding them "royal canin" kitten food and decided to switch to "instinct" kitten food and also added this into the canned food. I changed their diet for a dinner and also a breakfast, and this afternoon she is having the most perfect kitten poop! I'm not sure if it's this probiotics that worked or the "instinct" kitten food (or maybe both?), but I'm glad she is not having diarrhea anymore so I'm sticking with this diet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: My cat won’t touch the stuff
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, my cat won’t touch even her favorite food with this in it. I had high hopes and bought it as soon as it came out. Going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby and Friends

customer_reviews.title: Helped a stopped up cat.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my picky 16yo cat who has been having bowel problems. Namely, difficulty defecting. His poops were hard as a rock. It got so bad he stopped eating due to being backed up. He absolutely loves this stuff. I mix a scoop in one meal a day and I can best describe it as putting dry gravy over kibble. In addition to him eating better, he’s pooping more normally. As you would expect, his mood has improved, too.
customer_reviews.author: Archaeologist

customer_reviews.title: MY CATS LOVE! Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: My cat Jaxson scarfs his food down. I’m assuming that because of this is why he would often have loose poop and sometimes he would throw up. Once, maybe twice a week. After being on this for a few weeks we probably had one more puking incident. Have not had ANY poop or puke was problems since. Also I give this to both my cats and one tub lasts me a little over a month. I’m on my second tub and bc of amazon Prime ordering the product and getting it quickly is a breeze. I will definitely continue to order this. It has saved me from so much annoying cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Arabella

customer_reviews.title: This product WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Our senior cat had consistent diarrhea for about 3 months. After doing our research, we tried feeding her canned organic pumpkin, rice mixed with boiled chicken, anti-diarrheal drops, etc...to no avail. (The pumpkin worked a little, once.) After about 10 days of giving her this probiotic, the diarrhea stopped and now she is back to making solid stools. We added 1 level scoop to each serving of her premium dry cat food; tossed it around in her bowl to coat each nugget. It took awhile for her to warm up to the flavor, but she ate it in time. Give this product at least 2 to 3 weeks before expecting any real results. So glad we did!
customer_reviews.author: gwenb

customer_reviews.title: Not all cats may like this product
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very finicky. She will not eat soft food or human food. She likes her current hard food. When I added the probiotic as instructed she smelled her food looked at me and walked away. When I came back later some of it was gone. Not sure if it was my cat or the other house cat that will sometime eat her food if she doesn't. We gave this product a week and she just didn't take to it.
customer_reviews.author: Chickadee

customer_reviews.title: My kitty and I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, love the scooper. Switched over from Fortiflora which comes in packet form. 30 packets of Fortiflora is 1.6 ounces of product. One jar of Jackson Galaxy’s probiotic with enzymes. (Fortiflora no enzymes) is 4.2 ounces. 4 times the amount for the same price is a no brainer. My kitty loves it, so much so that she walks away from her meal if I don’t put it on. So I ration the recommended dose of 1 scoop per day over her 3-4 meals. Poop is perfect now and even smells better. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product helped my cat in 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has been having problems with digesting and he also has really bad dandruff. My daughter recommended I try probiotics. I started using the Jackson Galaxy probiotic and within THREE days, my cat's dandruff was gone! I couldn't believe it. Her coat looks beautiful and she doesn't seem to be having any of the digestive problems she had before. She's even more lively and moves quicker. I was skeptical at first, but this product works!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Dolliver

customer_reviews.title: This product works and my cat is much happier! Yay
customer_reviews.text: My cat was treated for a parasite with a pretty powerful antibiotic. He had a lot of stomach issues before I even knew what was happening and a round of antibiotics can also reek havoc on a digestive system. I used this probiotic daily, two meals a day, for about a month. He is much better! More playful and full of energy and a lot less gassy. Very good product. so glad I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Gave my boy loose stool
customer_reviews.text: This gave my boy lose stool. I stopped giving it to him for a few days, and his stool went back to normal. I had to request a refund. My search continues for a good probiotic for my fur-baby. He's 15 years old on June 28th (he's been part of our family since he was 3mths old), so now more than ever, he needs a probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: CutiePie

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the taste of this powder probiotic. She goes crazy when she sees me opening up the container. She’s 14 and had been suffering from soft stools despite being on a grain free healthy diet and this stuff keeps them a little more solid and less smelly. Her fur is shinier and she’s more playful. I recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8 yr old yellow tabby named Daisy Mae, and she ALWAYS has an icky stomach. I was thinking she was bingeing and purging, it was that bad. Till I got this product, the icky piles have stopped like overnight. I am still having her thoroughly looked at this coming Friday, but this is a GREAT PRODUCT. I don't know how it tasted, I gave it 5 stars, cause she eats it up like there's no tomorrow. I have 2 other cats, I started giving them the same. Every day I slit a can of what I call kitty krack, the fancy feast with gravy, i put it in that and stir really good
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a fantastic product. Easy to use. I like that it comes with a scoop, so no guess work on dosing. I like that this is a clean product. No additives or fillers. No weird chemical preservatives. I Give each cat a scoop in their wet food and mix it in. My crew of four like the flavor, and don’t seem to notice the supplement in their food. Cats seem to be sleeping better and have more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Darque

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After spending a lot of time and money at the vets trying to find a solution to my cat's diarrhea I found the solution with Jackson Galaxy Cat Probiotics. She is a very picky eater and rejects much of what I have tried but after a gradually increasing dose to her food, she loves it! No more explosive diarrhea multiple times a day and she is eating much better than she ever has. Thank you, Jackson I am so grateful!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: It Took A While, But Finally Success!
customer_reviews.text: My three cats had to get used to the smell, but I encouraged them and kept at it and they eventually started eating their wet food with the probiotic mixed in. They love it now and woof down their dinner. I also mix it into their dry food and they like that as well. It works very well on my boy cat, and so-so on the girl cats. But it has reduced the vomiting, soft poo and gas issues. I'll keep buying this, as it's working better than anything else I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Linda Piersa

customer_reviews.title: Does what is Says!
customer_reviews.text: I began using this about a month ago as both my cats developed diarrhea. I did get some meds from the vet but he said to add probiotics to their food as well. I purchased because it had good reviews and said that the cats liked the taste. My cats did in fact eat their food with this mixed in without any trouble. It has definitely helped to regulate their digestive systems. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bootsy57

customer_reviews.title: Has enzymes. Great for a fur baby that needs to keep strong health
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I found this, here on Amazon. I’d bought another for cats & dogs, very good too, but I’m very happy with this. My cat has immune issues and with this and L- lan maple flavored gel. He’s doing AMAZING. He’s 19 and kept sneezing, runny eyes and tummy issues. This really helped his tummy and immune system. I give it to my other as well. There’s definitely a positive difference. It takes about a week to get in their system. I’m totally thrilled with this product. They love the taste I gave 4 stars for the smell. It’s not that bad now that I’m used to it. They love it. Imo they need this
customer_reviews.author: Renee M.

customer_reviews.title: Tried other brands, but this one seems to work better
customer_reviews.text: My cat was having intermittent digestion issues and I tried a few other brands before trying the Jackson Galaxy version. It’s only been a couple of weeks but so far it seems to be much better and I’m hoping it lasts. I’ve bought some other stuff from Jackson Galaxy and hope I can keep using this one.
customer_reviews.author: Target Dog

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, hate digging for the scoop
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised how fast the puking seised. I have ferals and strays that have no problem eating their dry or wet food with product. Definately buy again. Was using Fortiflora and hated all the little packets. This has a scoop, which is frustrating, but with a blob of hot glue on the top, works like a dream....no more sccopin out the scoop! Happy so far with Jackson Galaxy!
customer_reviews.author: Dell Rey

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it's fine, just not what my boy needed
customer_reviews.text: I thought this had helped my cat with his itching and what seemed to be allergy dermatitis. But, he started itching again. It took a while but I found a food that helped. I had to get one specially for food allergies. I don't think I'll be keeping up with this powder because i'm trying to limit his intake to make sure his dermatitis fully clears up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Doke

customer_reviews.title: This helped our cats with their digestive problems
customer_reviews.text: Our cats are picky eaters at the best of times and one of them has massive hairball issues because of his fur. This has helped both of our cats with their digestion and they apparently love the smell and flavor of it because they don't even seem to notice it's in the food. We only use one scoop and split it between the servings for their meal. If your cats have any kind of digestive issues where they can't keep their food down this might be a good solution
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Jackson Galaxy's Cat Probiotic: Epic Fail
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the product because no matter how I disgusted it, my cat would not touch it! "Cat Daddy's" product was an epic fail! And, it was too expensive to begin with! I would not recommend Jackson Galaxy's product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: issymc##

customer_reviews.title: Great Probiotic for cats!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! My cat has had two extremely devastating bouts with pancreatitis. So obviously he's got gastric issues. He's been on this almost two months now, and I can see a big difference. His favorite food is dry, and its prescription. So I sprinkle a level scoop onto his food, and then toss it around so it's all covered. He absolutely loves the taste of the Probiotics, and he's a very picky eater. I also love the fact that there is no more stinky smelly poop or pee. We will continue to use this. BTW, I'm still on the first jar. It lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cat actually ate it!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about buying something this expensive figuring the cat would turn his nose up. I was pleasantly surprised that he didn't seem to know it was added to his food. My guy is 16 so I feed him a teaspoon of food through out the day rather than morning and night. I would have liked to know the amount per day rather than a scoop when you feed them direction.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Helped stool and vomiting.
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat was having loose bowels and having stomach issues. Started giving her 1 scoop in Baby food meats(1 tsp) per day, and she has seen great improvements in stools and not throwing her food up. I think this has helped her as she is aging, nearing end. She is 17 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Mote

customer_reviews.title: Cats loved it
customer_reviews.text: We are a rescue and come across various digestive tract issues. We have tried many different things, prescription food, etc. And so far we have had the best results with this probiotic. And the cats seem to love the taste. They don't mind it sprinkled on their food.
customer_reviews.author: Kitties For Keeps Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, but helpful??
customer_reviews.text: My kitty LOVES this sprinkled into her dry food. It didn’t help with the issue that I hoped it would, itchy skin. That was what prompted me to purchase it. Her poop is larger than it had been. That’s about it... I may continue it simply because she likes it, but I honestly don’t believe she needs it.
customer_reviews.author: LunaFae

customer_reviews.title: This product made our cat better almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: Our cat had been on antibiotics and had started to throw up four or five times a day. When this came in the mail I gave it to him immediately that night and by the end of the second day he was not throwing up at all, and now seems normal, when he was lethargic and mostly slept all the time. It’s really a great product.
customer_reviews.author: lou ellen

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I needed more time
customer_reviews.text: I noticed one of my cats vomiting more after adding this to their food. I stopped adding it and the vomiting stopped. It may just not agree with him. All three of my cats eat together - maybe if I come up with a different feeding schedule I will add it back for the other two cats.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie R.Clark

customer_reviews.title: great product but be patient
customer_reviews.text: We've been using cat probiotics on our crew for a few years. In that time we've learned to transition slowly from one to another. With that said, our cats were slowly shifted over from our previous brand and we've lots of positive results. Now they are exclusively on Jacksons probiotic and we are seeing GREAT results. Less vomiting and a more perfect poop, cheers!
customer_reviews.author: CWS

customer_reviews.title: Useless product.
customer_reviews.text: Useless product. Used it for nearly 2 months and it made no difference in my cats digestive track. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lmadjd

customer_reviews.title: Cats won’t eat it
customer_reviews.text: Neither one of my cats would touch their food with this in it. So I can’t say whether it works or not!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy-Canyon Lake

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!!!
customer_reviews.text: Already reviewed... It’s terrific & helped to save my cats life who couldn’t stop throwing up.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Ate it right up
customer_reviews.text: Our one cat has also had a super sensitive stomach 💩. We’ve been using this probiotic for a couple of weeks and have seen way less/to barely any issues in the litter box, which is super exciting. I mix it with their freeze dried Stella and Chewy’s chicken meal, which we also add water to, and they eat it all like normal! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Miethner

customer_reviews.title: My Fur Babies LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my cats. One had health issues and because of antibiotics her stomach was in very bad shape. This product calmed her stomach and straightened out her bowels. I feed it to them all weekly. All my fur babies love it, eat it well and benefit from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mix it well!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats are up in age. They tend to do more hairballs but seem to struggle. One is thinner and older, the other is 6 months younger and a Garfield weight! My Garfield LOVES it but my finicky thin one can leave it!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Good price if you compare. My very picky cat will eat mixed in with her food. So glad it wasn't another well-intended throw away! Has helped improve her bowel movements. She tends to get constipated.
customer_reviews.author: Micello

customer_reviews.title: My Kitty has a sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.text: I have given this product to both of my cats. They both have seem to like the flavor. thier waste is so much better.one kitty has a sensitve stomach . this has improved greatly. The other kitty had chronic crusty eyes,t hat is much improved after giving them this product. I give it a big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Gale T.

customer_reviews.title: It appears to be equal to FortiFlora
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to compare. Several kittens with intestinal issues were treated with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: "They" hate it!
customer_reviews.text: My girlz won't eat their favorite wet food if this is added. There's another brand the Vet suggested that they like, but it's hard to get in my area. Was really hoping the Jackson brand would work out.
customer_reviews.author: Pa_tricia Shoppes💅

customer_reviews.title: Great product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love the taste of this probiotic powder. No more loose stool. Less smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THEY LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how my finicky kitties were going to react to a powder additive to their food but I needn't have worried. All of the kitties just love this stuff!! I sprinkle a little on their food and they gobble it right up!!
customer_reviews.author: KIM KARALUS

customer_reviews.title: Helping my foster kittens
customer_reviews.text: I use the product on my baby and older foster kittens, and mama cats. Helps them with the good food that I give them after the living on the streets eating garbage
customer_reviews.author: Evlwife

customer_reviews.title: Not for us, but seems like a good product
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this but unfortunately it made our kitty throw up. We had tried other probiotics that she tolerated well, and decided to try this one because we’re huge Jackson Galaxy fans. I don’t think it’s anything against the product, just didn’t agree with our kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews, but this product is wonderful! My cat actually eats the powder without any food. A first for any of the cats I have owned. My friend's cat also tried it as straight powder. Unfortunately, it is not working as an anti-diarrhea product. I still have to give my cat Miralax daily, but that is because he has had most of his colon removed. I will keep giving it to him for the probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my cat. But might work for yours ?
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t really done much about my cats diarrhea. I’ve been using it for a month and my meow meow is still gassy and exploding all over the place. On to the next one...
customer_reviews.author: 👑

customer_reviews.title: Use with canned food
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because my cat has chronic diarrhea. She refused to eat it sprinkled over dry food, but devoured it when I mixed it with canned food. At only four days, it's too soon to see whether it works on her problem, but at least she's eating it. As far as the star ratings are concerned, the scent is fine, I'm assuming the taste is nasty unless mixed, and I'd say it will be well worth the money if it keeps us from having to spend $200 at the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My cat actually loves the taste of this! And what's even better is that I'm no longer having to sneak in two products: one probiotic powder and another enzyme powder because this one has BOTH!!! YAY!!! Thank you, Jackson for making this great all-in-one!
customer_reviews.author: S&T

customer_reviews.title: My geriatric cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this so much that I don’t even need to mix it in his food! If I just sprinkle it on the top it seems to encourage him to eat. And he’s very picky
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Furr

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats apparently love it. Just got it today, and sprinkled a scoop of it onto their food that they had leftover from earlier, and they immediately started eating the leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: A. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Probiotics for cats
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for my boys everyday but not sure if it works as they still occasionally vomit but it seems they are having more trouble breathing like a weird choking noise and huffing. I hope its not something more serious
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This products seal was broke when I opened it.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to rate higher but I do not feel comfortable giving this to my cat as the seal was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Karelen B. MacKie

customer_reviews.title: probiotics
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a few weeks to work. I really didn't notice any difference in my three cats. Will keep giving until it's all gone.
customer_reviews.author: C. P

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat had numerous issues that were all were reduced or alleviated by this product. We are so thankful that we found it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Finicky cats may not like
customer_reviews.text: My 14 cat is finicky. Being familiar with Jackson Galaxy I gave this a try. However, she wouldn't eat her food with this mixed in. Will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased second container. Has been working great for our older cat for helping with loose stool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it didn't help my kitty, but she did like it so had no problem administering.
customer_reviews.author: M.E. Blagen

customer_reviews.title: Sticky poo
customer_reviews.text: Made my cat’s poop VERY stinky and did not seem to help his diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our cat highly recommends this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty cat loves this on her dry food. She is fed a spoonful of wet canned food twice a day and I sprinkle the probiotic on her dry food. It's healthy for her & she enjoys her dry food much more now. Thanks, Jackson!! We learn so much from you and our cat's life is better because of YOU!
customer_reviews.author: MartRhon

customer_reviews.title: Bowels have firmed up
customer_reviews.text: I used it for digestive problems and liquid stools the cats stools have firmed up and he is mostly making it to the litter box with only once a week maybe not making entirely to the litter box. Have to mix fairly well because he will leave his food if he finds the powder texture. Both my cats receive it because they swap bowls when eating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: If you have issues with your cat vomiting after eating, as I did. This is the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie D.

customer_reviews.title: my cats do not vomit and they can poop
customer_reviews.text: i have six cats and their all over the age of 7 so health problems start happening and I was desperate to find something that was easy and effective . I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Donna Devaney

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Makes my cat throw up every time it is placed in his food. Recommend DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Kickboxer

customer_reviews.title: Not appealing to all cats.
customer_reviews.text: My cat would not eat anything I mixed this with. He did not care for it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Have had good luck with both cats accepting the pumpkin flavor (took a bit of getting used to) and they now seem to look forward to meals each morning. Greatly reduced vomiting and furballs and a better water intake. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gordo

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: my cats really loved it eating it out of the jar if they can get to it. I found most of my animals coats much better and healthier they playfulness returned ( even in the 10 year old) this product really works.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Hornsby

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping, not a magic silver bullet
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working/helping my kitty with his tummy problems (when he visits his brother and eats another kind of dry food.) I say seems, so I’m only giving it a 4 so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Nesheim

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves the taste!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this supplement! He’ll eat any food I put this powder on. He loves it so much, he’s always trying to figure how to get IN TO the jar.
customer_reviews.author: cari49

product_meta.title: Jackson Galaxy Cat Probiotics - Best Cat Probiotics for Diarrhea, Vomiting, Gas, Allergies - Pet Probiotic Powder with Cat Digestive Enzymes - 120 Grams
product_meta.description:
The Secret To Giving Your Cat Back Digestive Health Without Using Harmful Pharmaceutical Drugs!

Does your cat have diarrhea, gas, bad breath, bloating, itching, or loose stools? Are you looking for cat vitamins and supplements without harmful pharmaceutical drug side effects?

Give Jackson Galaxy Probiotic for Cats and Watch Your Cats Digestive Health Return.

Digestive Issues are the underlying cause of these problems. Antibiotics, steroids, and other meds from pharmaceutical companies contain dangerous drugs and chemicals with side effects. When your cat takes them, it affects their natural digestion and causes other problems. Our natural, veterinary formulated formula contains a powerful blend of the Most Important Probiotic Bacteria, Lactobacillus Acidophilus, L. Plantarum, L. Brevis, L. Fermentum, and Lactococcus Lactis. This proprietary formula (and a unique Blend of Cat Enzymes) boosts your cats immune system and gives remarkable improvements quickly. 

Why Our Premium Probiotic Powder is Better! 
Natural Vitamins for Cats with no adverse side effects provide digestive support for cats and boosts the immune system.
Our Unique Enzyme Blend promotes maximum nutrient absorption and supports optimal digestion of proteins, fats, carbohydrates, fiber, and complex sugars throughout the entire digestive tract.
Our No Heat No Cook process ensures 100% potency. Other cooked powders lose over 50% of their potency.
Each scoop of probiotic powder ensures the perfect amount of flora needed for gastrointestinal health.
Easy way to keep your fur ball healthy. Sprinkle one scoop on their food each day and watch them thrive.
All Natural Chicken Liver Flavor your cat will love!
USA Manufactured.

Click "Add To Cart" Button above to bring back digestive health!
feature_bullets: EFFECTIVE PROBIOTICS FOR CATS: Our daily probiotic for cats and pancreatic enzymes for cats helps with cat vomiting, diarrhea, gas, bloating, constipation, and sensitive stomach cat food can cause. A daily dose of Jackson Galaxy Digestive Enzymes for cats will ease their discomfort, develop a stronger immune system, and keep your cat happier at all stages of life.
NATURAL ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Our Cat Probiotic uses USA ingredients that have no dangerous side effects, are Grain, Corn, and Dye Free.

DELICIOUS TASTE YOUR CAT WILL LOVE: Our veterinary formula uses real chicken liver that your cat won't be able to resist. Cats love the rich taste that makes their favorite meals even more scrumptious.
100% MAXIMUM POTENCY: Our No Heat No Cook process ensures your cat gets 100% potency of our pet probiotics. Other brands loose over 50% of their potency during production.

PREMIUM QUALITY JACKSON APPROVED: We take pride in the premium quality of our Jackson Galaxy Probiotic for Cats. Our factory is inspected annually by APHIS, and certified by a third party independent lab.
